Edgewood Sailing School: Salinity Workshop

Fri Aug 15 2025

We had a wonderful time at the Edgewood Sailing School in Cranston, RI! We explored salinity measurement and telemetry techniques with the students. Some pics from the workshop below:

Salinity measurement equipment.
Going over the instructions for the hands-on portion.
Explaining the telemetry setup.
Hands-on building and experimentation.
Working with the data on the laptop.
A glance at the workshop in action.
The boats at Edgewood Sailing School.
More sailboats ready for the water.
One of the larger boats at the school.
Found a horseshoe crab during our explorations!
A friendly visitor at the workshop.
